message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher. Could you consider $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
